description: 1Collect all .out and .json files from tamcheck_data and create a tar.gz archive with a date suffix.

output_dir.description: 1The root output directory. Defaults to /var/tmp if PT_output_dir is not set.

implementations.name: data_collect.py
implementations.description: Python implementation that archives .out and .json files into a tar.gz. Errors are printed to stdout/stderr.
